pkgmetadata.longdescription: Transport Data and Commands Across the 'FAME' / 'R' Border // Transport data and commands across the 'FAME' https://fame.sungard.com/support.html / 'R' border. A set of utilities for: reading 'FAME' databases into 'R'; writing 'R' data into 'FAME' databases; executing 'FAME' commands in 'R' environment; and, executing 'R' commands from the 'FAME' environment.
